title: Citibank Introduces New Citibank/AADVANTAGE® MasterCard Black to the Peruvian Market
summary: Lima, Peru – Citibank, committed to continuously contributing to Peru's growth through innovation, has 91 years of uninterrupted presence in the country. Aiming to consolidate its position within the premium-market segment, Citibank introduces its new Citibank/AAdvantage® MasterCard Black, a product with exclusive features targeted to fulfilling the most-demanding needs of the affluent segment.
tag-1: Citibank Introduces New Citibank/AADVANTAGE® MasterCard Black to the Peruvian Market
tag-3: Lima, Peru – Citibank, committed to continuously contributing to Peru's growth through innovation, has 91 years of uninterrupted presence in the country. Aiming to consolidate its position within the premium-market segment, Citibank introduces its new Citibank/AAdvantage® MasterCard Black, a product with exclusive features targeted to fulfilling the most-demanding needs of the affluent segment.
tag-4: The Citibank/AAdvantage® MasterCard Black enable clients to earn 1.5 AAdvantage® miles for every U.S. dollar spent or its soles (Peruvian currency) equivalent at any merchant, at a local and international level, as well as granting 5,000 AAdvantage® miles to new clients on their first purchase.
tag-5: Program benefits include an exclusive Priority Pass membership that gives clients access to more than 600 VIP lounges at airports worldwide. Among the benefits offered by MasterAssist Black, eligible cardholders and their family members are covered for up to US$125,000 in medical expenses when traveling out of their home country as well as US$6,000 from MasterSeguro (MasterInsurance) in case of death.
tag-6: Jose Antonio Blanco, Citi Country Officer of Peru, highlighted the values the new Citibank/AAdvantage® MasterCard Black wbrings to clients: "The unique characteristics, exclusive benefits and coverage of Citibank, in Peru and at a global level, make the Citibank/AAdvantage® MasterCard Black a premium product. It is specifically designed to allow clients to live memorable experiences while fulfilling the needs of the affluent segment and includes the coverage that only Citibank can offer at a global level."
tag-7: Juan Antonio Cabanas, MasterCard Country Manager for Peru and Bolivia, stressed the importance of its alliance with one of the longest-established bank in Peru, and emphasized that its VIP-segment clients will receive exclusive benefits and unique offers.
tag-8: "The new MasterCard Black has been designed for the affluent client who expects a premium-quality service. That´s why the Black events and benefits platform makes it a one-of-a-kind product," he said.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
tag-10: MasterCard Worldwide As a leading global payments company, MasterCard Worldwide prides itself on being at the heart of commerce, helping to make life easier and more efficient for everyone, everywhere. MasterCard serves as a franchisor, processor and advisor to the payments industry, and makes commerce happen by providing a critical economic link among financial institutions, governments, businesses, merchants, and cardholders worldwide. In 2010, $2.7 trillion in gross dollar volume was generated on its products by consumers around the world. Powered by the MasterCard Worldwide Network – the fastest payment processing network in the world – MasterCard processes over 23 billion transactions each year and has the capacity to handle 160 million transactions per hour, with an average network response time of 130 milliseconds and with 99.99 percent reliability. MasterCard advances global commerce through its family of brands, including MasterCard®, Maestro®, and Cirrus®; its suite of core products such as credit, debit, and prepaid; and its innovative platforms and functionalities, such as MasterCard PayPass™ and MasterCard inControl™. MasterCard serves consumers, governments, and businesses in more than 210 countries and territories. For more information, please visit us at www.mastercard.com.
